en_text: Those with shells bring only calamity.

en_text: I would never ask to be invited.

en_text: You sure are harsh to everyone that isn't a fairy.

en_text: Think of all the people and spirits that were lost because of him.

en_text: Well, then, Chise-kun, take care of yourself.

en_text: He hasn't changed at all in ten years.
